name: 02-dry-divtober-2022
title: 02. Dry : Divtober 2022
description: This entry for #divtober was focused on understanding how to use CSS animation to make a sun set.  There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/xylb7FpKgkE and an article about overcoming the challenges of animating a gradient background at https://medium.com/@robleto/how-to-lighten-darken-gradients-with-pure-css-4a9800b044e5
